Name: Corner Gas Animated
Title: Squatch Your Language
Desc: Wanda, Hank and Lacey attempt to terrorize Brent; Davis and Emma's obsession with a fantasy TV show.
LongDescription: Wanda, Hank, and Lacey attempt to terrorize Brent with a Sasquatch hoax; Davis and Emma's obsession with a fantasy TV show called THRONE STRIFE forces Karen and Oscar to spend time together.
